My Repositories

|| This portofolio is built with vanilla JS, HTML5 and SCSS5 ||
Below are some of my repositories with their UI and code.

This app allows users to create account, login and post a blog. User information and Posts are stored in the postgreSQL database and displayed on a paginated UI.
The app was built using Python(Flask) on both front and back end and the UI enhanced using SASS. The app is deployed to Heroku

View Project UI Github repo

This app is a content ap. It receives posts from a fake rest API and displays them on a paginated UI. You can add, update and delete posts. It is similar to the one below only that it was built entirely with a framework. You can check out their differences in their respective Github Repositories. It was built using React JS Framework

View Project UI Github repo

An app that allows user to input
food item and its calories and display the information
on the interface. It also displays the total amount of calories.
Built using Vanilla JS(IIFEs), HTML and CSS

View Project UI Github repo

This is a small car race project
built using JQuery, HTML and CSS3
